executiveSummary.core: Founding engineer at 8090.ai pioneering AI-powered Software Factory for enterprise automation. Built SDLC automation platform delivering custom software from PRD to production in 3-6 months. 22+ years of experience bridging engineering (10 years), consulting (4 years), product management (3 years), and cloud sales (5 years, 2019-2024) with proven P&L ownership.
keyMetrics: Built Software Factory delivering 8+ enterprise projects with $500K+ annual subscriptions
Achieved 85-90% automation rates across healthcare, life sciences, and insurance verticals
Generated measurable ROI: $2M+ cost savings, 50+ FTE reductions, 20-40% diagnostic improvements
Scaled Pivotal's modernization practice from $0 to $250M ARR in 3 years
Generated >$250M revenue at Google Cloud with >300 opportunities in 2023
Holder of 19 patents in enterprise software and distributed systems

workStyle.whatsappIntro: I am a software engineer by training who has about 22 years of experience in 1. engineering 2. technical consulting 3. GTM and 4. Product Management. My areas of expertise are application modernization, Cloud and Applied AI. Recently I was a founding member of my startup 8090.ai where I lead Customer Projects. Companies I have worked in the past include IBM, Pivotal Labs (acquired by VMWare), Google and now 8090. I lead customer projects in Pharma and Healthcare
workStyle.twitterIntro: Boris, I want to work for you. I am an engineer, a founding member of http://8090.ai, and a huge fan of @claudeai claude code. We are building a software factory using claude code (8090.ai). Increasingly, I am convinced Claude code is the ANSWER and all other wrappers will disappear.
